message.raw:
Added a 'device' that runs arbitrary functions before/after the experiment.

Syntax is such that the device can in future be extended to run functions
in the middle of the experiment in software time, but that is not yet
implemented.

Also still todo is to save results of the functions, including whether they raise
exceptions or not. An option for whether to stop on exception or not should
also be able to be set as a device property, so that failing functions don't
stop the experiment from cycling.
